Project Templates

These tools are used in Agile project management and are designed to help you manage projects more efficiently.

They're used by the Digital and Service Design Team and we utilise them as tools when supporting colleagues’ projects through their lifecycle. However, they do not have to be used exclusively for projects run in co-operation with the Digital and Service Design Team. We also encourage colleagues across Sport Wales to utilise some of these resources.

Templates for your projects

Business Case

Present a business case to initiate your new project and set out how it fits within Sport Wales work and vision

Download

Management Approach Definition

Set out how your new project will be managed

Download

Project Delivery Plan

Set out what you want to deliver and plan your sprint tasks

Download

RAID Log

Track and manage potential risks, assumptions, issues, and dependencies of a project

Download

Project Canvas

Map your key project information - including problem statement, scope, and stakeholders

Download

MoSCoW Prioritisation

Capture project requirements and give them weights of importance to guide your scope

Download

Prioritised Requirements List

Track your project progress against your requirements

Download
